import { Link, NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import { useState } from "react" import { FaBars, FaSearch, FaMicrophone, FaUser, FaHeart, FaShoppingCart, } from "react-icons/fa" import "./NavBar.css" export default function NavBar({ cartCount, wishlistCount, onSearch, }) { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false) const [search, setSearch] = useState("") const handleSearch = (value) => { setSearch(value) onSearch(value) } return ( <>
setMenuOpen(false)}>Home setMenuOpen(false)}>Shop setMenuOpen(false)}>Cart setMenuOpen(false)}>About
{/* Hamburger â†’ MOBILE ONLY */} setMenuOpen(!menuOpen)} /> {/* Desktop links */}
Home Shop About
handleSearch(e.target.value)} />
{wishlistCount > 0 && {wishlistCount}} {cartCount > 0 && {cartCount}}
) }
